name: browser_automation
description: Launches a Firefox browser through Selenium (requires Selenium server and geckodriver on localhost:4444) and navigates to the specified URL. Can optionally extract the full HTML of the page or intelligently extract just the main article text. Supports saving the extracted content to a local file.

url.description: The full URL of the page to navigate to, for example: https://example.com

save_path.description: Optional local file path where the extracted page content (HTML or article text) should be saved.

extract_article.description: If true, the tool will attempt to intelligently extract the main article text from the page, rather than returning the full HTML.
